title: refactor: consolidate social news pipeline into 3-tier architecture
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Streamlining the buzz
gist.blurb: We've consolidated our social news pipeline into a unified 3-tier architecture. The hive is more organized than ever.
gist.summary: Refactored the social news generation pipeline into a unified 3-tier architecture, replacing disparate platform-specific workflows.
gist.impact: Improves maintainability and coordination of automated project updates.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot as an engineer working on a clean, organized pipeline system. Represents the new architecture.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot wearing a tiny hard hat, adjusting a sleek lime green (#ecf874) pipeline. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'PIPELINE'. Nostalgic and tidy.
